docs.title: Break & Continue Practice
docs.text: Illustrates how break exits a loop and continue skips to the next iteration.

docs.title: Calculator Tool
docs.text: The Calculator Tool performs basic arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

docs.title: How to Use
docs.text: Choose an operation and input two numbers.

docs.title: For Loop Practice
docs.text: Demonstrates list and dictionary iteration with for loops.

docs.title: List Organizer Tool
docs.text: Helps you interact with Python lists—adding elements, slicing, and copying.

docs.title: Loop-Else Prime Checker
docs.text: Demonstrates using else in a loop to detect prime numbers.

docs.title: Match Statement Practice
docs.text: Demonstrates Python's match-case statement to pattern match values and object structures.

docs.title: Example
docs.text: ```python match value: case 1: print("One") case _: print("Default")

docs.title: Number Classifier Tool
docs.text: Classifies an integer as negative, zero, one, or more.

docs.title: Pass Statement Demo
docs.text: Shows three uses of the pass statement: in loops, placeholder functions, and empty classes.

docs.title: Example
docs.text: ```python while True: pass # Press Ctrl+C to stop

docs.title: Range Practice
docs.text: Demonstrates Python's range() for generating sequences and iterating.

docs.title: String Toolkit
docs.text: Analyzes strings, repeats them, extracts substrings, counts vowels, and identifies special characters.

docs.title: Word Counter Tool
docs.text: The Word Counter Tool reads a text file and counts the number of words it contains.

docs.title: How to Use
docs.text: Run the tool and provide a text input or file path. It returns the word count.
